hello:
Hello! Let's play a game. I'll think of the number from 1 to 99 and you try to guess it.
To start the game type 'start'.
start: I've thought of the number from 1 to 99. Now you type your guess and i will give you some hints.
too small: Your number is smaller than my number.
too big: Your guess is too big. Try another number.
right:
You got it! Congrats!
Tries: {{tries}}, number: {{number}}
end:
Ok. The number was {{number}}.
Let's try again.
out of range: The number is from 1 to 99. Try another one.
not start yet: I don't think of the number yet. Type 'start' to begin the game.
not prime: Your number is not prime, but my is.
